questions.question: What does Chandler say he's doing when Joey enters the apartment?
questions.explanation: Chandler is sitting in the canoe when Joey enters the apartment.

questions.question: What item does Monica lose in one of the quiche cups?
questions.explanation: Monica realizes one of her fake nails is missing and it's in one of the quiche cups.

questions.question: Why does Mrs. Geller have frozen lasagnas in her freezer?
options: She's storing them for a friend
She bet that Monica would mess up catering
questions.correct_answer: She bet that Monica would mess up catering
questions.explanation: Mrs. Geller reveals that she had frozen lasagnas as a backup in case Monica messed up catering.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler being handcuffed to the chair in Joanna's office?
options: As a result of Joanna's desire to keep him waiting for her
questions.correct_answer: As a result of Joanna's desire to keep him waiting for her
questions.explanation: Joanna handcuffs Chandler to the chair as a way to keep him waiting for her while she's away.

questions.question: What does Phoebe suggest Monica do to prove her mother wrong?
options: Finish the job she was hired to do
questions.correct_answer: Finish the job she was hired to do
questions.explanation: Phoebe encourages Monica to finish the catering job to prove her mother wrong.

questions.question: What is the term that Phoebe and Monica decide to redefine to mean something positive?
questions.explanation: Phoebe and Monica decide to redefine 'pulling a Monica' to mean doing something impressive or successful.

questions.question: What does Joey offer to pay for the encyclopedias?
questions.explanation: Joey offers to pay zero dollars for the encyclopedias, but later agrees to pay 50 dollars for one book.

questions.question: What is the name of the book that Joey chooses to buy from the salesman?
questions.explanation: Joey chooses to buy the V book, which includes information about vomit and other topics starting with the letter V.

questions.question: Why does Rachel try to lock Chandler back up in Joanna's office?
options: Because she wants to keep him as her prisoner
Because she's trying to protect her job
Because she's playing a prank on him
questions.correct_answer: Because she's trying to protect her job
questions.explanation: Rachel tries to lock Chandler back up to avoid getting in trouble with Joanna for letting him out.

questions.question: What does Rachel offer to do for Chandler in exchange for his freedom?
options: Cook his meals for a month
Give him a foot rub every day
Make him a legend by spreading rumors about his encounter with Joanna
questions.correct_answer: Make him a legend by spreading rumors about his encounter with Joanna
questions.explanation: Rachel offers to make Chandler a legend by spreading rumors about his encounter with Joanna in exchange for his freedom.

questions.question: What does Monica's mother say she will have in her freezer the next time Monica caters for her?
questions.explanation: Monica's mother says that the next time Monica caters for her, there will be nothing but ice in the freezer.

questions.question: What does Joey say about volcanoes at the end of the episode?
options: They are a type of rock formation
They are a type of igneous rock formation
They are a violent igneous rock formation
They are a dormant type of rock formation
questions.correct_answer: They are a violent igneous rock formation
questions.explanation: Joey says that volcanoes are a violent igneous rock formation, showing off his new knowledge from the encyclopedia.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when Phoebe whispers the rumor about Chandler to them?
questions.explanation: The gang is amused and laughs when Phoebe whispers the rumor about Chandler to them.

questions.question: Why does Chandler check his watch at the end of the episode?
options: To see if it's time for lunch
To see if it's time for a date
To see how long the rumor about him has been going around
To see if it's time to leave
questions.correct_answer: To see how long the rumor about him has been going around
questions.explanation: Chandler checks his watch to see how long the rumor about him has been going around, and comments that it lasted for two hours.

questions.question: What is the term that Rachel uses to describe the rumors that will be spread about Chandler?
questions.explanation: Rachel uses the term 'a legend' to describe the rumors that will be spread about Chandler, implying that they will be exaggerated and impressive.

questions.question: What does Monica's mother do at the end of the episode?
options: She congratulates Monica on a job well done
She thanks Monica for her help
questions.explanation: Monica's mother is seen biting her nails at the end of the episode, despite Monica's earlier reminder not to do so.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to try to help Monica with her catering job?
options: She goes to the store to buy more ingredients
questions.correct_answer: She goes to the store to buy more ingredients
questions.explanation: Phoebe offers to go to the store to buy more ingredients, specifically a new set of nails, to help Monica with her catering job.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's initial reluctance to break up with Joanna?
options: He is in love with her
He is trying to protect Rachel's job
He is enjoying the attention and perks of dating his boss
questions.correct_answer: He is enjoying the attention and perks of dating his boss
questions.explanation: Chandler is initially reluctant to break up with Joanna because he is enjoying the attention and perks of dating his boss.

questions.question: What does Rachel use to gag Chandler in Joanna's office?
questions.explanation: Rachel uses Chandler's own tie to gag him in Joanna's office.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Monica's catering job at her mother's party?
questions.explanation: Monica's catering job at her mother's party is a huge success, with the guests enjoying her casserole.
